permissions.permissionUserRequired: Sie müssen über die folgenden Berechtigungen verfügen, um diesen Befehl verwenden zu können: {{0}}.
permissions.permissionBotRequired: I must have the following permissions to use this command: {{0}}.
permissions.title: Berechtigungen

onMention: Hallo, {{0}}. Mein Präfix in dieser Gilde ist `{{1}}`. Wenn Sie sehen möchten, was ich tun kann, verwenden Sie `{{1}}hilfe`.
onMentionWithRole: <:chino_rawr:751215250245943318> **|** Hello, {{0}}. My prefix in this guild is `{{1}}`, but you're not allowed execute commands here. If you want to see what I can do, use `{{1}}help` on {{2}}.
missingBotPermission: Ich habe nicht die {{perm}} Berechtigung. Überprüfen Sie meine Berechtigungen/Rollen, und versuchen Sie es erneut.
missingUserPermission: sie nicht über die {{perm}} Berechtigung. Sie können diesen Befehl nicht ausführen.
missingBotPermissionOnChannel: Hey {{0}} I don't have the {{1}} permission on {{2}}. Please, check my permissions and try again.
invalidUser: user not found. Make sure you have @mentioned them, or check the ID.
invalidRole: role not found. Make sure you have @mentioned it, or check the ID.
invalidEmoji: emoji not found. Are you sure this emoji is from this guild?

punishment.bigReason: you must write an shorter reason, this reason is too big to me.

missingArgs: Invalid arguments! Use `{{prefix}}{{commandName}}` to see the correct usage.

addedToGuild.description:
Whoa {{0}}! Thanks for adding me in `{{1}}`, let me introduce myself.

I'm a little bot with many functions that can be useful, like... **moderation**, **fun** and **utilities**. By default, my prefix is `{{2}}`

If you need help, then join my support server using `{{2}}help` or `{{2}}invite`. Have fun and see you later.
addedToGuild.guildSaved: Successfully saved the server {{0}} in the database!

noAliases: This command doesn't have any aliases.
afkRemoval: {{user}}, as you're back, I removed your AFK status.

voice.clientAreNotInVoiceChannel: I'm not in a voice channel.

voice.minVolume: calm down! The minimal volume allowed is `5`.

guildban.title: Guild Banned
guildban.explain: `{{0}}` is banned, according to the reason below. Do you think the ban was unfair? Join my [support server](https://discord.gg/Jr57UrsXeC) and maybe get them unbanned.

cooldown: please, wait more {{0}} seconds to execute this command again!
disabledCommand:
sorry, but, this command has some problems and it is disabled for a while
**Reason:** `{{0}}`
blockedChannel: you can't use commands here, go to {{0}} and try again.
migrateToSlashCommand: Hey! After January 2022 I'll only answer to slash commands, please, if you want to continue using me, then you must re-add me, you can do that by clicking on this url: <https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id={{0}}&scope=bot%20applications.commands&permissions=8560045566&guild_id={{1}}>, you don't need kick me out of the server, just click on the url. Thank you! <a:chino_petpet:760564885280784405>
